Package: com.kazurayam.ks

[Groovy] Class TextsDiffer

    • com.kazurayam.ks.TextsDiffer

    • Compare 2 texts, create a report which shows the diff of the 2 inputs. The input text could be an instance of various classes: java.nio.file.Path, java.io.File, java.lang.String, java.net.URL, java.io.Reader and java.io.InputStream. This class can be used as a custom keyword in Katalon Studio. The output report is compiled in Markdown format. So you would require a Markdown viewer. For example, Visual Studio Code with Markdown: https://code.visualstudio.com/Docs/languages/markdown

      date:
      Sept, 2023
      Authors:
      kazurayam
